text: Jerome Floyd Gantt (born August 24, 1948) is an American former athlete, who played both American and Canadian football. He played college football at North Carolina Central University. Gantt went on to play for the Buffalo Bills in the NFL, Hamilton Tiger-Cats, Saskatchewan Roughriders, and Montreal Alouettes in the CFL. He finished his career at the Charlotte Hornets in the WFL. He won the Grey Cup with Hamilton in 1972. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Saskatchewan Roughriders players Category:Montreal Alouettes players Category:Charlotte Hornets (WFL) players Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Canadian football offensive linemen Category:North Carolina Central Eagles football players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Sportspeople from Greensboro, North Carolina Category:Players of American football from North Carolina Category:American players of Canadian football
title: Jerry Gantt
